Keywords: Hydra , Past , Power Elite , Ruler , Scientist , Soldier , Spy
Real Name: Johann Schmidt
Special Powers
HAIL HYDRA!: Leadership. When Red Skull uses it and succeeds, you may instead generate a Avengers Forever #003 Hydra Agent on click #1. If a 6 was rolled, you may instead generate a Avengers Forever #019 Hydra Officer on click #1 if there is not a friendly Avengers Forever #019 Hydra Officer on the map already.
AND TWO MORE SHALL TAKE ITS PLACE: Combat Reflexes, Mastermind, Toughness. // Once per turn, when Red Skull uses Mastermind to choose a friendly character with the Hydra keyword and that character is KO'd from the attack, after resolutions you may generate up to two Avengers Forever #003 Hydra Agents on click #3.
THIS TIME YOU WILL NOT BE SO LUCKY, CAPTAIN: Close Combat Expert, Outwit.
